With this extension you can change the color of pictures and text on any site.
To modify a sat element, right-click on it and choose what you want to do with it from the extension menu.Naturally, if you donâ€™t like something in your design, you can change it by deleting the old one using special buttons in the menu and then creating everything from scratch but even cooler.When you are satisfied with all your changes, you can take a screenshot using the create - snapshot button and then immediately go to the site where you can share your design with other users. To go to the site at any time there is a special create - go to site button. Thank you.
